00045         #define CAEN_VME_INVALID_HANDLE                 -1

00047 
00048 AppSettings::AppSettings( void (* scope_refresh)( int, bool), void (*update_samples_ready_led)( bool)): m_vme_link(0), m_vme_board_num(0), m_vme_handle( CAEN_VME_INVALID_HANDLE),
00049                                                                 ScopeRefresh( scope_refresh), UpdateSamplesReadyLed( update_samples_ready_led), m_mutex( wxMUTEX_RECURSIVE)
00050 {
00051         wxString setting_filename;
00052         setting_filename= AppSettings::get_default_path()+ _("settings.txt");
00053         if( wxTheApp->argc>= 2) {
00054                 wxFileName tmpname= wxFileName( wxTheApp->argv[ 1]);
00055                 if( tmpname.IsRelative()) {
00056                         setting_filename= wxGetCwd()+ wxFileName::GetPathSeparator()+ tmpname.GetFullPath();
00057                 }
00058         }
00059         if (!wxFile::Exists(setting_filename)) {
00060                  wxLogError(_T("Unable to find the settings file ")+ setting_filename);
00061                 return;
00062         }
00063         wxConfigBase::Set( new wxFileConfig( wxEmptyString, wxEmptyString, setting_filename, setting_filename, wxCONFIG_USE_LOCAL_FILE ));
00064         for( int i= 0; i< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; i++)
00065         {
00066                 m_grid_pen[ i]= NULL;
00067                 m_mid_grid_pen[ i]= NULL;
00068                 m_back_brush[ i]= NULL;
00069         }
00070 }
00071 
00072 AppSettings::~AppSettings(void)
00073 {
00074         delete wxConfigBase::Set((wxConfigBase *) NULL);
00075 
00076         // Delete channel list
00077         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_board_array.GetCount(); i++)
00078         {
00079                 delete (GenericBoard*)this->m_board_array[i];
00080         }
00081         this->m_board_array.Clear();
00082 
00083         // Close VME handling
00084         this->EndVME();
00085 
00086         for( int i= 0; i< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; i++)
00087         {
00088                 if( this->m_grid_pen[ i]!= NULL)
00089                 {
00090                         delete this->m_grid_pen[ i];
00091                         this->m_grid_pen[ i]= NULL;
00092                 }
00093                 if( this->m_mid_grid_pen[ i]!= NULL)
00094                 {
00095                         delete this->m_mid_grid_pen[ i];
00096                         this->m_mid_grid_pen[ i]= NULL;
00097                 }
00098                 if( this->m_back_brush[ i]!= NULL)
00099                 {       
00100                         delete this->m_back_brush[ i];
00101                         this->m_back_brush[ i]= NULL;
00102                 }
00103         }
00104 }
00108 bool AppSettings::Load( void)
00109 {
00110         /*
00111         Application setting file structure
00112         [RECORD]
00113         |
00114         |- RECORD_FOLDER= ./record/           // The folder where to store record files
00115         [TRIGGER]
00116         |
00117         |- TRIGGER_MSK= 0                     // Bitmask : 0x0001: external 0x0002: Channels 0x0004: autoretrig 
00118         |- POST_TRIGGER= 0       
00119         |- TRIGGER_POSITION_KEEP= 0       
00120         |- SAMPLE_BLOCK_SIZE= 0                    
00121     |- TRIGGER_EDGE= 0               // 0: No Trigger  1: Rising edge  2: Falling edge
00122         [MISC]
00123         |
00124         |- VME_BOARD_TYPE=V1718
00125         |- VME_LINK=0
00126         |- VME_BOARD_NUM=0
00127         |- STARTED=0                                                                    // Get acquisition status upon loading
00128         |- SHOW_LEFT_PANE= 0                                                    // Get the left pane show status upon loading
00129         |- SHOW_BOTTOM_PANE= 0                                                  // Get the bottom pane show status upon loading
00130         |- SHOW_SCOPE_0_PANE= 0                                                 // Get the scope 0 pane show status upon loading
00131         |- SHOW_SCOPE_1_PANE= 0                                                 // Get the scope 1 pane show status upon loading
00132         |- SHOW_SCOPE_2_PANE= 0                                                 // Get the scope 2 pane show status upon loading
00133         |- SHOW_SCOPE_3_PANE= 0                                                 // Get the scope 3 pane show status upon loading
00134         |- GRID_LINE_COLOR_0= 0xffffff                                  // RGB grid color for scope 0
00135         |- GRID_LINE_COLOR_1= 0xffffff                                  // RGB grid color for scope 1
00136         |- GRID_LINE_COLOR_2= 0xffffff                                  // RGB grid color for scope 2
00137         |- GRID_LINE_COLOR_3= 0xffffff                                  // RGB grid color for scope 3
00138         |- GRID_LINE_TYPE_0= 0                                                  // Grid line type for scope 0
00139         |- GRID_LINE_TYPE_1= 0                                                  // Grid line type for scope 1
00140         |- GRID_LINE_TYPE_2= 0                                                  // Grid line type for scope 2
00141         |- GRID_LINE_TYPE_3= 0                                                  // Grid line type for scope 3
00142         |- GRID_LINE_WIDTH_0= 1                                                 // Grid line width for scope 0
00143         |- GRID_LINE_WIDTH_1= 1                                                 // Grid line width for scope 1
00144         |- GRID_LINE_WIDTH_2= 1                                                 // Grid line width for scope 2
00145         |- GRID_LINE_WIDTH_3= 1                                                 // Grid line width for scope 3
00146         |- OFFSET_SEC_0= 0.0                                                    // Horizontal offset for scope 0
00147         |- OFFSET_SEC_1= 0.0                                                    // Horizontal offset for scope 1
00148         |- OFFSET_SEC_2= 0.0                                                    // Horizontal offset for scope 2
00149         |- OFFSET_SEC_3= 0.0                                                    // Horizontal offset for scope 3
00150         |- SEC_2_DIV_0= 1000                                                    // Div/ Sec conversion factor ( div_val= SEC_2_DIV* sec_val) for scope 0
00151         |- SEC_2_DIV_1= 1000                                                    // Div/ Sec conversion factor ( div_val= SEC_2_DIV* sec_val) for scope 1
00152         |- SEC_2_DIV_2= 1000                                                    // Div/ Sec conversion factor ( div_val= SEC_2_DIV* sec_val) for scope 2
00153         |- SEC_2_DIV_3= 1000                                                    // Div/ Sec conversion factor ( div_val= SEC_2_DIV* sec_val) for scope 3
00154         |- BACKGROUND_COLOR_0= 0x000000                                 // RGB color background color for scope 0
00155         |- BACKGROUND_COLOR_1= 0x000000                                 // RGB color background color for scope 1
00156         |- BACKGROUND_COLOR_2= 0x000000                                 // RGB color background color for scope 2
00157         |- BACKGROUND_COLOR_3= 0x000000                                 // RGB color background color for scope 3
00158         |- EXT_RATE_MHZ= 100                                                    // external sample rate (MHz)
00159         |- INT_RATE_MHZ= 10                                                             // internal sample rate (MHz)
00160         |- USE_EXT_CLOCK= 0                                                             // use external clock
00161         |- USE_TTL= 0                                                                   // use TTL/NIM external signals
00162         |- MAX_LOG_X= 1000
00163         |- ACQ_BOARD_NUM= N
00164         [ACQ_BOARDS]
00165         |
00166         |- [0]
00167         |   |
00168         |   |- BOARD_TYPE= V1724
00169         |   |- { OTHER BOARD DATA}
00170         |   ...
00171         |- [N- 1]
00172         |   |
00173         |   |- BOARD_TYPE= V1724
00174         |   |- { OTHER BOARD DATA}
00175         */
00176         unsigned int i;
00177         // Delete previously stored boards
00178         this->m_board_array.Clear();
00179         wxConfigBase* config= wxConfigBase::Get( false);
00180         if( !config)
00181         {
00182                 wxLogError( _("Cannot get configuration file\n"));
00183                 return false;
00184         }
00185 
00186         wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_mutex);
00187         
00188         //
00189         // Get Record Folder
00190         config->Read(  _("/RECORD/RECORD_FOLDER"), &this->m_record_folder, "./");
00191         // Sanity checks
00192         if( !wxDir::Exists( this->m_record_folder))
00193         {
00194                 // Set to current directory
00195                 this->m_record_folder= "./";
00196         }
00197 
00198         //
00199         // Get Trigger msk
00200         int trigger_msk= 0;
00201         config->Read( _("/TRIGGER/TRIGGER_MSK"), &trigger_msk, 0);
00202         this->m_trigger_msk= (AppSettings::TRIGGER_MSK)trigger_msk;
00203 
00204         //
00205         // Get Post Trigger
00206         this->m_post_trigger= 0;
00207         config->Read( _("/TRIGGER/POST_TRIGGER"), &this->m_post_trigger, 0);
00208 
00209         //
00210         // Get Keep trigger position flags
00211         int tmp;
00212         config->Read( _("/TRIGGER/TRIGGER_POSITION_KEEP"), &tmp, 0);
00213         this->m_trigger_position_keep= tmp? true: false;
00214 
00215 
00216         //
00217         // Get trigger edge type
00218         int edge_type;
00219         config->Read( _("/TRIGGER/TRIGGER_EDGE"), &edge_type, (int)NO_TRIGGER);
00220         this->m_trigger_edge_type= (TRIGGER_EDGE_TYPE)edge_type;
00221 
00222         //
00223         // Get the number of sample per channel
00224         this->m_num_sample= 0;
00225         config->Read( _("/TRIGGER/NUM_SAMPLE"), &this->m_num_sample, 0);
00226 
00227         //
00228         // Get VME board type
00229         config->Read( _("/MISC/VME_BOARD_TYPE"), &this->m_vme_board_type_string, _("V1718"));
00230         //
00231         // Get VME board link
00232         config->Read( _("/MISC/VME_LINK"), &this->m_vme_link, 0);
00233         //
00234         // Get VME board number
00235         config->Read( _("/MISC/VME_BOARD_NUM"), &this->m_vme_board_num, 0);
00236 
00237         //
00238         // Get acquisition status upon loading
00239         config->Read( _("/MISC/STARTED"), &tmp, 0);
00240         this->m_started= tmp? true: false;
00241 
00242         //
00243         // Get show left pane status upon loading
00244         config->Read( _("/MISC/SHOW_LEFT_PANE"), &tmp, 0);
00245         this->m_show_left_pane= tmp? true: false;
00246 
00247         //
00248         // Get show bottom pane status upon loading
00249         config->Read( _("/MISC/SHOW_BOTTOM_PANE"), &tmp, 0);
00250         this->m_show_bottom_pane= tmp? true: false;
00251 
00252         //
00253         // Get Show scope left top pane upon loading
00254         config->Read( _("/MISC/SHOW_SCOPE_0_PANE"), &tmp, 0);
00255         this->m_show_scope_left_top_pane= tmp? true: false;
00256 
00257         //
00258         // Get Show scope right top pane upon loading
00259         config->Read( _("/MISC/SHOW_SCOPE_1_PANE"), &tmp, 0);
00260         this->m_show_scope_right_top_pane= tmp? true: false;
00261 
00262         //
00263         // Get Show scope left bottom pane upon loading
00264         config->Read( _("/MISC/SHOW_SCOPE_2_PANE"), &tmp, 0);
00265         this->m_show_scope_left_bottom_pane= tmp? true: false;
00266 
00267         //
00268         // Get Show scope right bottom pane upon loading
00269         config->Read( _("/MISC/SHOW_SCOPE_3_PANE"), &tmp, 0);
00270         this->m_show_scope_right_bottom_pane= tmp? true: false;
00271 
00272         for( int scope_index= 0; scope_index< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; scope_index++)
00273         {
00274                 wxString scope_index_string= wxString::Format( "_%d", scope_index);
00275                 //
00276                 // Get grid line color
00277                 wxString grid_line_color_rgb_string= _("");
00278                 config->Read( _("/MISC/GRID_LINE_COLOR")+ scope_index_string, &grid_line_color_rgb_string, _("0xffffff"));
00279                 unsigned long grid_line_color_rgb;
00280                 wxString hex_part;
00281                 if( grid_line_color_rgb_string.Upper().StartsWith(_("0X"), &hex_part))
00282                 {
00283                         // Hex format
00284                         if( !hex_part.Trim().ToULong( &grid_line_color_rgb, 16))
00285                         {
00286                                 grid_line_color_rgb= 0x00ffffff;
00287                         }
00288                 }
00289                 else
00290                 {
00291                         // Decimal format
00292                         if( !grid_line_color_rgb_string.Trim().ToULong( &grid_line_color_rgb, 10))
00293                         {
00294                                 grid_line_color_rgb= 0x00ffffff;
00295                         }
00296                 }
00297                 this->m_grid_line_color[ scope_index].Set( (grid_line_color_rgb>> 16)& 0xff, (grid_line_color_rgb>> 8)& 0xff, grid_line_color_rgb& 0xff);
00298 
00299                 //
00300                 // Get line type
00301                 int grid_line_type;
00302                 config->Read( _("/MISC/GRID_LINE_TYPE")+ scope_index_string, &grid_line_type, 1);
00303                 this->m_grid_line_type[ scope_index]= (GRID_LINE_TYPE)grid_line_type;
00304 
00305                 //
00306                 // Get line width
00307                 config->Read( _("/MISC/GRID_LINE_WIDTH")+ scope_index_string, &this->m_grid_line_width[ scope_index], 1);
00308 
00309                 //
00310                 // Get horizontal offset (sec)
00311                 config->Read( _("/MISC/OFFSET_SEC")+ scope_index_string, &this->m_offset_sec[ scope_index], 0.0);
00312 
00313                 //
00314                 // Get Div/ Sec conversion factor
00315                 config->Read( _("/MISC/SEC_2_DIV")+ scope_index_string, &this->m_sec_2_div[ scope_index], 1000.0);
00316                 this->SetSec2Div( scope_index, this->m_sec_2_div[ scope_index]);
00317 
00318                 //
00319                 // Get background color
00320                 wxString back_color_rgb_string= _("");
00321                 config->Read( _("/MISC/BACKGROUND_COLOR")+ scope_index_string, &back_color_rgb_string, _("0x000000"));
00322                 unsigned long back_color_rgb;
00323                 if( back_color_rgb_string.Upper().StartsWith(_("0X"), &hex_part))
00324                 {
00325                         // Hex format
00326                         if( !hex_part.Trim().ToULong( &back_color_rgb, 16))
00327                         {
00328                                 back_color_rgb= 0x00ffffff;
00329                         }
00330                 }
00331                 else
00332                 {
00333                         // Decimal format
00334                         if( !back_color_rgb_string.Trim().ToULong( &back_color_rgb, 10))
00335                         {
00336                                 back_color_rgb= 0x00ffffff;
00337                         }
00338                 }
00339                 this->m_background_color[ scope_index].Set( (back_color_rgb>> 16)& 0xff, (back_color_rgb>> 8)& 0xff, back_color_rgb& 0xff);
00340         }
00341         //
00342         // Get external sample rate (MHz)
00343         config->Read( _("/MISC/EXT_RATE_MHZ"), &this->m_ext_rate_MHz, 10);
00344         //
00345         // Get clock type usage (internal or external)
00346         config->Read( _("/MISC/USE_EXT_CLOCK"), &tmp, 0);
00347         this->m_use_ext_clock= tmp? true: false;
00348         
00349         this->SetClock( this->m_use_ext_clock, this->m_ext_rate_MHz);
00350 
00351         //
00352         // Get clock type usage (internal or external)
00353         config->Read( _("/MISC/USE_TTL"), &tmp, 0);
00354         this->m_use_TTL= tmp? true: false;
00355 
00356         //
00357         // Get maximum logical value X
00358         config->Read( _("/MISC/MAX_LOG_X"), &this->m_max_log_X, 1024);
00359 
00360 
00361         int acq_board_num= 0;
00362         config->Read( _("/MISC/ACQ_BOARD_NUM"), &acq_board_num, 0);
00363 
00364         this->InitVME();
00365         wxString board_base_string= _("/ACQ_BOARDS/");
00366 
00367         //
00368         // Boards loop
00369         for( i= 0; i< (unsigned int)acq_board_num; i++)
00370         {
00371                 GenericBoard *board= ( GenericBoard *)0;
00372                 wxString board_string= wxString::Format( "%s%i/", board_base_string.c_str(), i);
00373 
00374                 //
00375                 // Get the board type
00376                 wxString board_type= _("");
00377                 config->Read( board_string+ _("BOARD_TYPE"), &board_type, _("V1724"));
00378 
00379                 if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("")))
00380                 {
00381                         // No board specified: detect it from registers
00382                         // Create a temporary generic board object to get the board type
00383                         cvt_board_data tmp_data;
00384                         memset( &tmp_data, 0, sizeof( tmp_data));
00385                         wxString board_add_string= _("");
00386                         config->Read( board_string+ _("ADDRESS"), &board_add_string, _("0"));
00387                         unsigned long board_add= 0;
00388                         wxString hex_part;
00389                         if( board_add_string.Upper().StartsWith(_("0X"), &hex_part))
00390                         {
00391                                 // Hex format
00392                                 if( !hex_part.Trim().ToULong( &board_add, 16))
00393                                 {
00394                                         board_add= 0;
00395                                 }
00396                         }
00397                         else
00398                         {
00399                                 // Decimal format
00400                                 if( !board_add_string.Trim().ToULong( &board_add, 10))
00401                                 {
00402                                         board_add= 0;
00403                                 }
00404                         }
00405                         tmp_data.m_base_address= (UINT16)board_add;
00406                         tmp_data.m_vme_handle= this->m_vme_handle;
00407                         
00408                         // HACK: the following code assumes a V17XX ADC board type is connected so we loose
00409                         // in generality about board types (i.e. it must be hacked to be able to connect to boards
00410                         // other than V17XX ones.)
00411 
00412                         int board_id= CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_V1724;
00413                         const char *def_board_string= "V1724";
00414                         // 
00415                         // read the board id
00416                         if( !V17XXBoard::GetBoardId( tmp_data, board_id))
00417                         {
00418                                 wxLogError( wxString::Format( "Cannot read BOARD INFO : defaulting to '%s'\n", def_board_string));
00419                                 board_id= CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_V1724;
00420                         }
00421 
00422                         switch( board_id)
00423                         {
00424                                         // 24 Series
00425                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_V1724:                     //  V1724
00426                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_VX1724:            // VX1724
00427                                         board= new V1724Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_VME);
00428                                         break;
00429                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_DT5724:            // DT5724
00430                                         board= new V1724Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_DESKTOP);
00431                                         break;
00432                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_N6724:                     //  N6724
00433                                         board= new V1724Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_NIM);
00434                                         break;
00435 
00436                                         // 21 Series
00437                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_V1721:                     //  V1721
00438                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_VX1721:            // VX1721
00439                                         board= new V1721Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_VME);
00440                                         break;
00441                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_DT5721:            // DT5721
00442                                         board= new V1721Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_DESKTOP);
00443                                         break;
00444                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_N6721:                     //  N6721
00445                                         board= new V1721Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_NIM);
00446                                         break;
00447 
00448                                         // 31 Series
00449                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_V1731:                     //  V1731
00450                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_VX1731:            // VX1731
00451                                         board= new V1731Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_VME, false);
00452                                         break;
00453                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_DT5731:            // DT5731
00454                                         board= new V1731Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_DESKTOP, false);
00455                                         break;
00456                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_N6731:                     //  N6731
00457                                         board= new V1731Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_NIM, false);
00458                                         break;
00459 
00460                                         // 20 Series
00461                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_V1720:                     //  V1720
00462                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_VX1720:            // VX1720
00463                                         board= new V1720Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_VME);
00464                                         break;
00465                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_DT5720:            // DT5720
00466                                         board= new V1720Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_DESKTOP);
00467                                         break;
00468                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_N6720:                     //  N6720
00469                                         board= new V1720Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_NIM);
00470                                         break;
00471 
00472                                         // 40 Series
00473                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_V1740:                     //  V1740
00474                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_VX1740:            // VX1740
00475                                         board= new V1740Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_VME);
00476                                         break;
00477                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_DT5740:            // DT5740
00478                                         board= new V1740Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_DESKTOP);
00479                                         break;
00480                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_N6740:                     //  N6740
00481                                         board= new V1740Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_NIM);
00482                                         break;
00483 
00484                                         // 51 Series
00485                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_V1751:                     //  V1751
00486                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_VX1751:            // VX1751
00487                                         board= new V1751Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_VME, false);
00488                                         break;
00489                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_DT5751:            // DT5751
00490                                         board= new V1751Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_DESKTOP, false);
00491                                         break;
00492                                 case CVT_V17XX_RCFG_BOARD_ID_N6751:                     //  N6751
00493                                         board= new V1751Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_NIM, false);
00494                                         break;
00495 
00496                                 default:
00497                                         // Unknown board type
00498                                         wxLogError( wxString::Format( "Unknown board id '0x%08X'\n", board_id));
00499                                         break;
00500                         }
00501                 }
00502                 else
00503                 {
00504                         // A board was specified : create a board of proper type
00505 
00506                         // VME
00507                         if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1724")))
00508                         {
00509                                 // V1724
00510                                 board= new V1724Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_VME);
00511                         }
00512                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1721")))
00513                         {
00514                                 // V1721
00515                                 board= new V1721Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_VME);
00516                         }
00517                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1720")))
00518                         {
00519                                 // V1720
00520                                 board= new V1720Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_VME);
00521                         }
00522                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1731")))
00523                         {
00524                                 // V1731 Not DES mode
00525                                 board= new V1731Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_VME, false);
00526                         }
00527                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1731_DES")))
00528                         { 
00529                                 // V1731 DES mode 
00530                                 board= new V1731Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_VME, true);
00531                         }
00532                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1740")))
00533                         {
00534                                 // V1740
00535                                 board= new V1740Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_VME);
00536                         }
00537 
00538                         // DESKTOP
00539                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("DT5724")))
00540                         {
00541                                 // V1724
00542                                 board= new V1724Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_DESKTOP);
00543                         }
00544                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("DT5721")))
00545                         {
00546                                 // V1721
00547                                 board= new V1721Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_DESKTOP);
00548                         }
00549                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("DT5720")))
00550                         {
00551                                 // V1720
00552                                 board= new V1720Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_DESKTOP);
00553                         }
00554                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("DT5731")))
00555                         {
00556                                 // V1731 Not DES mode
00557                                 board= new V1731Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_DESKTOP, false);
00558                         }
00559                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("DT5731_DES")))
00560                         { 
00561                                 // V1731 DES mode 
00562                                 board= new V1731Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_DESKTOP, true);
00563                         }
00564                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("DT5740")))
00565                         {
00566                                 // V1740
00567                                 board= new V1740Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_DESKTOP);
00568                         }
00569                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1751")))
00570                         {
00571                                 // V1751 Not DES mode
00572                                 board= new V1751Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_VME, false);
00573                         }
00574                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("V1751_DES")))
00575                         { 
00576                                 // V1751 DES mode 
00577                                 board= new V1751Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_VME, true);
00578                         }
00579                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("DT5751")))
00580                         {
00581                                 // V1731 Not DES mode
00582                                 board= new V1751Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_DESKTOP, false);
00583                         }
00584                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("DT5751_DES")))
00585                         { 
00586                                 // V1751 DES mode 
00587                                 board= new V1751Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_DESKTOP, true);
00588                         }
00589 
00590                         // NIM
00591                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("N6724")))
00592                         {
00593                                 // V1724
00594                                 board= new V1724Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_NIM);
00595                         }
00596                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("N6721")))
00597                         {
00598                                 // V1721
00599                                 board= new V1721Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_NIM);
00600                         }
00601                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("N6720")))
00602                         {
00603                                 // V1720
00604                                 board= new V1720Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_NIM);
00605                         }
00606                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("N6731")))
00607                         {
00608                                 // V1731 Not DES mode
00609                                 board= new V1731Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_NIM, false);
00610                         }
00611                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("N6731_DES")))
00612                         { 
00613                                 // V1731 DES mode 
00614                                 board= new V1731Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_NIM, true);
00615                         }
00616                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("N6740")))
00617                         {
00618                                 // V1740
00619                                 board= new V1740Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_NIM);
00620                         }
00621                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("N6751")))
00622                         {
00623                                 // V1751 Not DES mode
00624                                 board= new V1751Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_NIM, false);
00625                         }
00626                         else if( !board_type.Trim().CmpNoCase( _("N6751_DES")))
00627                         { 
00628                                 // V1751 DES mode 
00629                                 board= new V1751Board( i, this->ScopeRefresh, this->UpdateSamplesReadyLed, &this->m_mutex, this, V17XXBoard::BV_NIM, true);
00630                         }
00631                         else
00632                         {
00633                                 // Unknown board type
00634                                 wxLogError( wxString::Format( "Unknown board type '%s'\n", board_type.c_str()));
00635                                 // return false;
00636                         }
00637                 }
00638                 if( !board)
00639                 {
00640                         continue;
00641                 }
00642                 this->m_board_array.Add( board);
00643                 this->m_board_type_strings.Add( board_type);
00644                 this->m_int_rate_MHz= board->GetClockMHz();
00645                 this->SetClock( false, 0);
00646 
00647                 // Open board handlers
00648                 if( !((GenericBoard*)this->m_board_array[i])->Open( this->m_vme_handle ))
00649                 {
00650                         wxLogError( _("Board open failure\n"));
00651                         //return false;
00652                 }
00653                 // Load board section
00654                 if( !((GenericBoard*)this->m_board_array[i])->LoadConfig( config, board_string))
00655                 {
00656                         wxLogError( _("Error loading board settings\n"));
00657                         //return false;
00658                 }
00659                 // Init board section
00660                 if( !((GenericBoard*)this->m_board_array[i])->Init( this->m_vme_handle))
00661                 {
00662                         wxLogError( _("Board init failure\n"));
00663                         //return false;
00664                 }
00665         }
00666 
00667         return true;
00668 }
00669 
00673 bool AppSettings::Save( void)
00674 {
00675         wxConfigBase* config= wxConfigBase::Get( false);
00676         if( !config)
00677                 return false;
00678         wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_mutex);
00679 
00680         //
00681         // Delete groups
00682         wxString group_id;
00683         long group_index;
00684         while( config->GetFirstGroup( group_id, group_index))
00685         {
00686                 config->DeleteGroup( group_id);
00687         }
00688         //
00689         // Set Record Folder
00690         if( !config->Write( _("/RECORD/RECORD_FOLDER"), this->m_record_folder))
00691                 return false;
00692 
00693         //
00694         // Set Trigger msk
00695         if( !config->Write( _("/TRIGGER/TRIGGER_MSK"), (int)this->m_trigger_msk))
00696                 return false;
00697 
00698         //
00699         // Set Post Trigger
00700         if( !config->Write( _("/TRIGGER/POST_TRIGGER"), this->m_post_trigger))
00701                 return false;
00702 
00703         //
00704         // Set Keep trigger position flags
00705         config->Write( _("/TRIGGER/TRIGGER_POSITION_KEEP"), this->m_trigger_position_keep? 1: 0);
00706 
00707         //
00708         // Set trigger edge type
00709         if( !config->Write( _("/TRIGGER/TRIGGER_EDGE"), (int)this->m_trigger_edge_type))
00710                 return false;
00711 
00712         //
00713         // Set the number of sample per channel
00714         if( !config->Write( _("/TRIGGER/NUM_SAMPLE"), this->m_num_sample))
00715                 return false;
00716 
00717         //
00718         // Set VME board type
00719         if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/VME_BOARD_TYPE"), this->m_vme_board_type_string))
00720                 return false;
00721         //
00722         // Set VME board link
00723         if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/VME_LINK"), this->m_vme_link))
00724                 return false;
00725         //
00726         // Set VME board number
00727         if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/VME_BOARD_NUM"), this->m_vme_board_num))
00728                 return false;
00729 
00730         //
00731         // Set acquisition status upon loading
00732         config->Write( _("/MISC/STARTED"), this->m_started? 1: 0);
00733 
00734         //
00735         // Set show left pane status upon loading
00736         config->Write( _("/MISC/SHOW_LEFT_PANE"), this->m_show_left_pane? 1: 0);
00737 
00738         //
00739         // Set show bottom pane status upon loading
00740         config->Write( _("/MISC/SHOW_BOTTOM_PANE"), this->m_show_bottom_pane? 1: 0);
00741 
00742         //
00743         // Get Show scope left top pane upon loading
00744         config->Write( _("/MISC/SHOW_SCOPE_0_PANE"), m_show_scope_left_top_pane? 1: 0);
00745 
00746         //
00747         // Get Show scope right top pane upon loading
00748         config->Write( _("/MISC/SHOW_SCOPE_1_PANE"), m_show_scope_right_top_pane? 1: 0);
00749 
00750         //
00751         // Get Show scope left bottom pane upon loading
00752         config->Write( _("/MISC/SHOW_SCOPE_2_PANE"), m_show_scope_left_bottom_pane? 1: 0);
00753 
00754         //
00755         // Get Show scope right bottom pane upon loading
00756         config->Write( _("/MISC/SHOW_SCOPE_3_PANE"), m_show_scope_right_bottom_pane? 1: 0);
00757 
00758         for( int scope_index= 0; scope_index< SCOPE_NUM_PANELS; scope_index++)
00759         {
00760                 wxString scope_index_string= wxString::Format( "_%d", scope_index);
00761 
00762                 //
00763                 // Set grid line color
00764                 wxString grid_line_color_rgb_string= wxString::Format( "0x%02x%02x%02x", this->m_grid_line_color[ scope_index].Red(), this->m_grid_line_color[ scope_index].Green(), this->m_grid_line_color[ scope_index].Blue());
00765                 if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/GRID_LINE_COLOR")+ scope_index_string, grid_line_color_rgb_string))
00766                         return false;
00767 
00768                 //
00769                 // Set line type
00770                 if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/GRID_LINE_TYPE")+ scope_index_string, (int)this->m_grid_line_type[ scope_index]))
00771                         return false;
00772 
00773                 //
00774                 // Set line width
00775                 if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/GRID_LINE_WIDTH")+ scope_index_string, this->m_grid_line_width[ scope_index]))
00776                         return false;
00777 
00778                 //
00779                 // Set horizontal offset (sec)
00780                 if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/OFFSET_SEC")+ scope_index_string, this->m_offset_sec[ scope_index]))
00781                         return false;
00782         
00783                 //
00784                 // Set Div/ Sec conversion factor
00785                 if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/SEC_2_DIV")+ scope_index_string, this->m_sec_2_div[ scope_index]))
00786                         return false;
00787 
00788                 //
00789                 // Set grid line color
00790                 wxString back_color_rgb_string= wxString::Format( "0x%02x%02x%02x", this->m_background_color[ scope_index].Red(), this->m_background_color[ scope_index].Green(), this->m_background_color[ scope_index].Blue());
00791                 if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/BACKGROUND_COLOR")+ scope_index_string, back_color_rgb_string))
00792                         return false;
00793         }
00794 
00795         //
00796         // Set external sample rate (MHz)
00797         if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/EXT_RATE_MHZ"), this->m_ext_rate_MHz))
00798                 return false;
00799         //
00800         // Set clock type usage (internal or external)
00801         if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/USE_EXT_CLOCK"), this->m_use_ext_clock? 1: 0))
00802                 return false;
00803 
00804         //
00805         // Set external signals standard: TTL/NIM
00806         if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/USE_TTL"), this->m_use_TTL? 1: 0))
00807                 return false;
00808 
00809         //
00810         // Set maximum logical value X
00811         if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/MAX_LOG_X"), this->m_max_log_X))
00812                 return false;
00813 
00814         //
00815         // Set board number
00816         if( !config->Write( _("/MISC/ACQ_BOARD_NUM"), (int)this->m_board_array.GetCount()))
00817                 return false;
00818 
00819         wxString board_base_string= _("/ACQ_BOARDS/");
00820         //
00821         // Boards loop
00822         for( size_t i= 0; i< this->m_board_array.GetCount(); i++)
00823         {
00824                 wxString board_string= wxString::Format( "%s%i/", board_base_string.c_str(), i);
00825                 //
00826                 // Set the board type
00827                 //if( !config->Write( board_string+ _("BOARD_TYPE"), ((GenericBoard*)this->m_board_array[i])->GetTypeString()))
00828                 //      return false;
00829                 if( !config->Write( board_string+ _("BOARD_TYPE"), this->m_board_type_strings[ i]))
00830                         return false;
00831 
00832                 // Save board section
00833                 if( !((GenericBoard*)this->m_board_array[i])->SaveConfig( config, board_string))
00834                         return false;
00835         }
00836 
00837         if( !config->Flush())
00838                 return false;
00839         return true;
00840 }
00841 bool AppSettings::InitVME( void)
00842 {
00843         // Init CAEN VME handle
00844         if( !this->m_vme_board_type_string.CmpNoCase(_("V1718")))
00845         {
00846                 CVErrorCodes cv_error_code;
00847                 if( ( cv_error_code= CAENVME_Init( cvV1718, this->m_vme_link, this->m_vme_board_num, &this->m_vme_handle))!= cvSuccess)
00848                 {
00849                         wxLogError( wxString::Format( _("VME Init failure board type= %s link= %i board num= %i error= %s"), this->m_vme_board_type_string.c_str(), this->m_vme_link, this->m_vme_board_num, CAENVME_DecodeError( cv_error_code) ));
00850                         return false;
00851                 }
00852         }
00853         else if( !this->m_vme_board_type_string.CmpNoCase(_("V2718")))
00854         {
00855                 CVErrorCodes cv_error_code;
00856                 if( ( cv_error_code= CAENVME_Init( cvV2718, this->m_vme_link, this->m_vme_board_num, &this->m_vme_handle))!= cvSuccess)
00857                 {
00858                         wxLogError( wxString::Format( _("VME Init failure board type= %s link= %i board num= %i error= %s"), this->m_vme_board_type_string.c_str(), this->m_vme_link, this->m_vme_board_num, CAENVME_DecodeError( cv_error_code) ));
00859                         return false;
00860                 }
00861         }
00862         else
00863         {
00864                 // Automatically check board type
00865                 CVErrorCodes cv_error_code;
00866                 // try V1718
00867                 if( ( cv_error_code= CAENVME_Init( cvV1718, this->m_vme_link, this->m_vme_board_num, &this->m_vme_handle))== cvSuccess)
00868                 {
00869                         return true;
00870                 }
00871                 // try V2718
00872                 if( ( cv_error_code= CAENVME_Init( cvV2718, this->m_vme_link, this->m_vme_board_num, &this->m_vme_handle))== cvSuccess)
00873                 {
00874                         return true;
00875                 }
00876                 wxLogError( wxString::Format( _("Cannot find any vme board (V1718 or V2718) on link '%d' and board number '%d'"), this->m_vme_link, this->m_vme_board_num));
00877                 return false;
00878         }
00879         return true;
00880 }
00881 bool AppSettings::EndVME( void)
00882 {
00883         CVErrorCodes cv_error_code;
00884         if( ( cv_error_code= CAENVME_End( this->m_vme_handle))!= cvSuccess)
00885         {
00886                 wxLogError( wxString::Format( _("VME End failure board type= %s link= %i board num= %i error= %s\n"), this->m_vme_board_type_string.c_str(), this->m_vme_link, this->m_vme_board_num, CAENVME_DecodeError( cv_error_code)));
00887                 return false;
00888         }               
00889         this->m_vme_handle= CAEN_VME_INVALID_HANDLE;
00890         return true;
00891 }
00892 
00893 bool AppSettings::SetGridPen( int scope_index, const wxPen* grid_pen, const wxPen* mid_grid_pen)
00894 {
00895         if( this->m_grid_pen[ scope_index]!= NULL)
00896         {
00897                 delete this->m_grid_pen[ scope_index];
00898                 this->m_grid_pen[ scope_index]= NULL;
00899         }
00900         this->m_grid_pen[ scope_index]= ( grid_pen== NULL)? NULL: new wxPen( *grid_pen);
00901 
00902         if( this->m_mid_grid_pen[ scope_index]!= NULL)
00903         {
00904                 delete this->m_mid_grid_pen[ scope_index];
00905                 this->m_mid_grid_pen[ scope_index]= NULL;
00906         }
00907         if( mid_grid_pen== NULL)
00908         {
00909                 this->m_mid_grid_pen[ scope_index]= ( grid_pen== NULL)? NULL: new wxPen( *grid_pen);
00910         }
00911         else
00912         {
00913                 this->m_mid_grid_pen[ scope_index]= new wxPen( *mid_grid_pen);
00914         }
00915         return true;
00916 }
00917 
00918 bool AppSettings::SetBackBrush( int scope_index, const wxBrush* back_brush)
00919 {
00920         if( this->m_back_brush[ scope_index]!= NULL)
00921         {       
00922                 delete this->m_back_brush[ scope_index];
00923                 this->m_back_brush[ scope_index]= NULL;
00924         }
00925         this->m_back_brush[ scope_index]= ( back_brush== NULL)? NULL: new wxBrush( *back_brush);
00926         return true;
00927 }
00928 
00929 void AppSettings::SetDiv2Pix( int scope_index, double div_2_pix_X)
00930 {
00931         wxMutexLocker lock( this->m_mutex);
00932 
00933         this->m_div_2_pix_X[ scope_index]= div_2_pix_X;
00934         this->m_sec_2_pix[ scope_index]= this->m_sec_2_div[ scope_index]* this->m_div_2_pix_X[ scope_index];
00935 }
00936 
00937 void AppSettings::SetSec2Div( int scope_index, double sec_2_div)
00938 {
00939         if( sec_2_div< 0.0000000001)
00940                 sec_2_div= 0.0000000001;
00941         this->m_sec_2_div[ scope_index]= sec_2_div;
00942 
00943         this->m_sec_2_pix[ scope_index]= this->m_sec_2_div[ scope_index]* this->m_div_2_pix_X[ scope_index];
00944 }
00945 
00946 void AppSettings::SetSec2Sample( double sec_2_sample)
00947 {
00948         if( sec_2_sample< 0.0000000001)
00949                 sec_2_sample= 0.0000000001;
00950         this->m_sec_2_sample= sec_2_sample;
00951 
00952         this->m_sample_2_sec= 1/ this->m_sec_2_sample;
00953 }
00954 void AppSettings::SetClock( bool use_ext_clock, double ext_rate_MHz)
00955 {
00956         if( ext_rate_MHz< 1)
00957                 ext_rate_MHz= 1;
00958         else if( ext_rate_MHz> 1000)
00959                 ext_rate_MHz= 1000;
00960         this->m_ext_rate_MHz= ext_rate_MHz;
00961 
00962         this->m_use_ext_clock= use_ext_clock;
00963 
00964         this->SetSec2Sample( this->m_use_ext_clock? (ext_rate_MHz)* 1000000.0: (this->m_int_rate_MHz)* 1000000.0);
00965 }
00966 
00967 const wxString AppSettings::get_default_path() {
00968 #ifdef WIN32
00969         return GetExecutablePath()+ wxFileName::GetPathSeparator();
00970 #else
00971         return _("/etc/CAENScope/");    
00972         //wxStandardPaths std_path;
00973         //              return std_path.GetLocalDataDir()+ wxFileName::GetPathSeparator();
00974 #endif
00975 }
00976 
00977 const wxString AppSettings::GetExecutablePath()
00978 {
00979     static bool found = false;
00980     static wxString path;
00981 
00982     if (found)
00983         return path;
00984     else
00985     {
00986 #ifdef __WXMSW__
00987 
00988         char buf[512];
00989         *buf = '\0';
00990         GetModuleFileName(NULL, buf, 511);
00991         path = buf;
00992 
00993 #elif defined(__WXMAC__)
00994 
00995         ProcessInfoRec processinfo;
00996         ProcessSerialNumber procno ;
00997         FSSpec fsSpec;
00998 
00999         procno.highLongOfPSN = NULL ;
01000         procno.lowLongOfPSN = kCurrentProcess ;
01001         processinfo.processInfoLength = sizeof(ProcessInfoRec);
01002         processinfo.processName = NULL;
01003         processinfo.processAppSpec = &fsSpec;
01004 
01005         GetProcessInformation( &procno , &processinfo ) ;
01006         path = wxMacFSSpec2MacFilename(&fsSpec);
01007 #else
01008         wxString argv0 = wxTheApp->argv[0];
01009 
01010         if (wxIsAbsolutePath(argv0))
01011             path = argv0;
01012         else
01013         {
01014             wxPathList pathlist;
01015             pathlist.AddEnvList(wxT("PATH"));
01016             path = pathlist.FindAbsoluteValidPath(argv0);
01017         }
01018 
01019         wxFileName filename(path);
01020         filename.Normalize();
01021         path = filename.GetFullPath();
01022 #endif
01023         found = true;
01024                 wxFileName fn( path);
01025                 path= fn.GetPath();
01026         return path;
01027     }
01028 }
